title: Donnie's Homespun Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located near Millikin University this place offers pizza, sandwiches, pita wraps, calzones, and craft beer. Check its web calendar for live music and open mic nights. Update Sept 2015 reported does not offer vegan cheese.
venueHours: Mon-Tue 11:00am-10:00pm, Wed 11:00am-2:00am, Thu 11:00am-10:00pm, Fri 11:00am-2:00am, Sat 4:00pm-2:00am, Sun 11:00am-8:00pm
